name: Kimm
content:
Kimm was a male Human thief on the planet Coruscant.
In 19 BBY, Kimm, along with his companions Forrie and an unnamed Bothan, were trying to steal freighters on a freighter park located on Quadrant G-80. Kimm and Forrie boarded the freighter Cornucopia in an attempt to steal it, not knowing that six Null-class Advanced Recon Commandos were aboard along with an Imperial Commando and the freighter's pilot. Both Kimm and Forrie were instantly killed by the commando Niner and Null ARC Ordo Skirata.
